casebody.data:
In the INTEREST OF M.C., A.M., L.M., and A.M., Minor Children, A.M., Father of A.M., L.M., and A.M., Appellant, A.C., Mother, Appellant. No. 18-0875 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed December 5, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

A mother and father challenge an order terminating their rights in their children. AFFIRMED ON BOTH APPEALS.

AFFIRMED ON BOTH APPEALS.
